clauses.title: The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice
clauses.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.
clauses.clause_text: AnonFiles administrators has the right to remove and/or permanently ban file content they find inappropriate.

case.text: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesnâ€™t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text: You are technically bound to accept this agreement by accessing/using the service.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: Only necessary user logs are kept by the service to ensure quality
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that only keep the strictly necessary logs on their servers and therefore protect your privacy.

case.text: Only necessary logs are kept by the service to ensure quality

clauses.title: The terms for this service are easy to read
clauses.description: The Agreements are well-organised, define legal terms (where applicable), aren't needlessly long and may be pleasant to read.

case.text: The terms for this service are easy to read

clauses.title: Conditions may change, but your continued acceptance is not inferred from an earlier acceptance
clauses.description: When you're not logged in to a service, but use it repeatedly, it may still feel weird that their terms and conditions can change between one use and the next. However, this does not violate the rule-of-thumb that each new version should be accepted from scratch, without inferring your acceptance from the acceptance of an earlier version. Since no acceptance is inferred from continued use, but only from current use, we rate this as neutral instead of bad.
clauses.clause_text: This user agreement is subject to change at any time, please review this agreement before you decide to use the service.

case.text: Conditions may change, but your continued acceptance is not inferred from an earlier acceptance

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text: AnonFiles disclaim all responsibility for loss of income due to downtime and/or data loss

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
clauses.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.
clauses.clause_text: AnonFiles can not guarantee full availability of the service, however, we do our best to keep the service as stable as possible.

case.text: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

clauses.title: This service prohibits users from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems
clauses.description: The service does not allow any attempts at hacking or otherwise gaining unauthorized access to other users' computers.
clauses.clause_text: It is strictly forbidden to spread viruses, trojans, corrupt

case.text: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems

clauses.title: Users agree not to submit illegal content

case.text: You agree not to submit illegal content
